Header: Army chief calls on State Minister of Defence
Content: Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva, Commander of the Army upon assumption of his office made his first formal courtesy call on State Minister of Defence, Ruwan Wijewardene at the State Ministry of Defence this morning. During the cordial meeting, Minister Wijewardene extended his best wishes and greetings to the new Commander of the Army and assured his best support for performance of the Commander’s duties.  The Minister said that he is really happy about the appointment of Shavendra Silva to the position of Army Commander as he had fulfilled a great service for the motherland during the humanitarian mission against LTTE terrorism. The brief meeting culminated after the Commander of the Army presented a memento to Hon Minister as a symbol of goodwill.
